turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm looking to book a table for dinner tonight. Preferably somewhere with good reviews and maybe some live music.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that! What time were you thinking, and how many people will be in your party? Also, what is your location?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: We're a party of four, and we're flexible on time but ideally between 7:00 and 9:00 PM. I'm located in downtown San Francisco. Wait, does the agent have access to my location info?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, I have access to your location as provided to the platform. Based on your criteria, I found three restaurants in the downtown area with live music and excellent reviews. However, none of them have any availability for tonight in that time frame. I found one which has openings at 6:00 PM or 9:30 PM. Should I proceed to book one of them? Or I can search for some different options that might be suitable.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, that's not great. Okay, what kind of reviews are we talking about for these restaurants? And how do I know the live music will be any good? Can you tell me what kind of music the restaurants offer?
